edu.ncsu.csc316.compression_manager.io

Class TextFileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc316.compression_manager.io.TextFileIO

  • public class TextFileIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class reads files to find if they shouold be compressed or decompressed. It also writes to output files depending on if the file needs to be compressed or decompressed.
    Author:
    John Ruisi

      • getProcess

        public static java.lang.String getProcess(java.lang.String file)
                                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Determines if the file needs to be compressed or decompressed
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be read
        Returns:
        COMPRESS if the file needs to be compressed
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the file was not found
